Text: Goo Goo Dolls (album):  It is the hardest to find of all the band's studio albums, being only an LP, out of print, and not in wide circulation to begin with.

3: What I Learned About Ego, Opinion, Art & Commerce

--------------------
Text: Goo Goo Dolls (album):  The song "I'm Addicted" was the only song from "Goo Goo Dolls" represented on the band's 2001 compilation album, "What I Learned About Ego, Opinion, Art & Commerce".

Text: Goo Goo Dolls (album):  The song "Torn Apart" was also included on the compilation album "Volume Two", which consisted of other album tracks, b-sides and rarities.
